job_description:
Company: FrontierTech
Position: AI Research Engineer
Location: Palo Alto, CA (On-site)
Salary: $160,000 - $220,000

About Us:
FrontierTech is an AI research company pushing the boundaries of artificial intelligence. We are dedicated to innovation and developing groundbreaking AI technologies.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled AI Research Engineer to conduct research and develop new AI algorithms and models. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning and deep learning.

Responsibilities:
- Conduct research on new AI algorithms and models.
- Implement and evaluate AI models using TensorFlow or PyTorch.
- Publish research papers in top AI conferences.
- Collaborate with other researchers and engineers.

Requirements:
- PhD in Computer Science or a related field.
- Strong background in machine learning and deep learning.
- Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
- Publications in top AI conferences.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with natural language processing (NLP).
- Experience with computer vision.
- Experience with reinforcement learning.

Benefits:
- Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI research.
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Collaborative and intellectually stimulating environment.
